summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2168, for the improvement of 4th Avenue West and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21727 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
